chain.description: Sure! I can help you search for tracks and artists using the Deezer API. What specific track or artist are you looking for?
It seems that there was an error with the Deezer API. Let me try again.
I apologize, but it seems that there is an issue with the Deezer API at the moment. Unfortunately, I cannot proceed with the task in the current state. Let me restart and try again.

is_id.description: The value of 'songs->id' field returned from .../shazam-songs/get-details endpoint

function.name: search_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Search for songs, artists that match input term"

term.description: Full name of songs or artists

limit.description: For paging purpose, maximum is fixed at 5 items per response

function.name: charts_track_for_shazam
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "shazam", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get all popular songs in specific chart"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm a music enthusiast and I want to explore different genres and artists. Can you help me search for tracks and artists using the Deezer API? Additionally, I would like to search for songs and artists using the Shazam API.
